description:
Yuma’s mother is an actress and she’s starring on a film in Nara, but Ashibe and Yuma shows up.
It turns out Ashibe’s Grandpa has brought them there.
Tamao Otama, an idol, is in the film too, but it’s her first time acting. 
Yuma’s mother gets upset at her acting skill and Tamao runs away...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 奈良名所巡りミステリー
